edu.umn.cs.spatialHadoop.visualization

Class SimpleGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Graphics
      • java.awt.Graphics2D
        • edu.umn.cs.spatialHadoop.visualization.SimpleGraphics

  • public class SimpleGraphics
extends Graphics2D
    A simple graphics class that draws directly on an a BufferedImage and does not require an active X11 display.
    Author:
    eldawy
